metadata: {"compiler":{"version":"0.8.30+commit.73712a01"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[],"devdoc":{"details":"Marked `internal` so there is NO external library linking required.      This library only performs hashing; it does not validate signatures.      All functions are `pure` and deterministic.      Pattern:      - Build a structHash with `abi.encode(typehash, ...)`      - Convert to a typed-data digest using EIP-712 prefix + domain separator:        keccak256(\"\\x19\\x01\" || domainSeparator || structHash)","kind":"dev","methods":{},"title":"GemStepTokenLib","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"notice":"Pure helpers for EIP-712 typed-data hashes used by GemStep.","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"c:/Users/DShar/OneDrive/08-BlockchainDev/8 - GST GemStep_Prod/GSTEP/contracts/token/libs/GemStepTokenLib.sol":"GemStepTokenLib"},"evmVersion":"prague","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"c:/Users/DShar/OneDrive/08-BlockchainDev/8 - GST GemStep_Prod/GSTEP/contracts/token/libs/GemStepTokenLib.sol":{"keccak256":"0x3f40f2f847785e7c1539d9bb3efd96784e426e61f613e3ff9dc967058b87d304","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://7ad0e917ff2defe8dfd0f4651f22ba919991d1a0558efec572a2a9dba6a49a92","dweb:/ipfs/QmcWzHZrrvfQyDFgJM5FnPfSJznddWkHtSSZCSWzX1pNuf"]}},"version":1}
